other_tests.findings: Medium vessel vasculitis consistent with polyarteritis nodosa (PAN).
A mononuclear cell infiltrate consistent with Langerhans cell histiocytosis (LCH) expressing CD1a and S100-protein.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A new biopsy revealed the absence of remaining cells expressing LCH markers after 6 months of vemurafenib treatment.
